data.text: @EU_Commission @Europarl_EN can we please think now on how to create Europe?!? For Real.. #1passport1army for all EU citizens!! #stayclose

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU No, no, no - please forgive us. I'm Scottish - we desperately want to remain in the EU.
@EU_Commission I've got a question. When can we vote back in...?
@EU_Commission after the Brexit, English should not be any more an european official language! Sprich Deutsch, Parlez Francais,Habla español
@EU_Commission #letscotlandstay please x
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU

#TimeIsNow for #EU to finally #BanInvoluntaryServitude #FreeWorld shouldnt tolerate #InvoluntaryServitude as #13Amendment @EU_Commission

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU No. The ENGLISH people want leave. Us canny Scots want to STAY.

We're sorry about England, please take us back! We love you and we'll prove that we can change!

Scotland
